title: New: Jana Horn – That Road We Travelled Down
content:
“we could feel the earth gather ink, it was cold and it was cold and you were crying”

Texas based singer Jana Horn has one of those rare voices that practically forces you to fall head over heels in love with her.

Comparisons to the likes of Marling and Jaffe are easy to draw, yet there’s a more playful atmosphere that Horn conjures up, preventing her from becoming just another female singer/songwriter. That Road We Travelled Down feels like it should have a Lana Del Rey ‘Video Games’ nostalgia inducing video accompanying it, both beautiful and eerily fitting.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
